trans-unit.source: Build the Downstream project and confirm that it can find and use the package components.
trans-unit.target: 生成 Downstream 项目，并确认它可以找到和使用包组件。

trans-unit.source: Build the project and store results in Build.xml for submission with the ctest_submit() command.
trans-unit.target: 生成项目并将结果存储在 Build.xml 中,以便使用 ctest_submit() 命令提交。

trans-unit.source: Build the software by running a command in the build tree. Record the build output log and detect warnings and errors. See the CTest Build Step section below.
trans-unit.target: 通过在构建树中运行命令来构建软件。记录构建输出日志并检测警告和错误。请参阅下面的“ CTest构建步骤”部分。

trans-unit.source: By default AUTOGEN_PARALLEL is initialized from CMAKE_AUTOGEN_PARALLEL.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， AUTOGEN_PARALLEL 是从 CMAKE_AUTOGEN_PARALLEL 初始化的。

trans-unit.source: By default AUTOMOC_COMPILER_PREDEFINES is initialized from CMAKE_AUTOMOC_COMPILER_PREDEFINES, which is ON by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， AUTOMOC_COMPILER_PREDEFINES 是从 CMAKE_AUTOMOC_COMPILER_PREDEFINES 初始化的，默认情况下为ON。

trans-unit.source: By default AUTOMOC_DEPEND_FILTERS is initialized from CMAKE_AUTOMOC_DEPEND_FILTERS, which is empty by default.

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES 是从 CMAKE_AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES 初始化的。

trans-unit.source: By default AUTORCC is processed by a custom command. If the .qrc file is GENERATED, a custom target is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， AUTORCC 由 custom command 。如果 .qrc 文件是 GENERATED ，则改用 custom target 。

trans-unit.source: By default ctest(1) does not print the output from the tests. The command line argument -V (or --verbose) enables verbose mode to print the output from all tests. The --output-on-failure option prints the test output for failing tests only. The environment variable CTEST_OUTPUT_ON_FAILURE can be set to 1 as an alternative to passing the --output-on-failure option to ctest(1).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， ctest(1) 不打印测试的输出。命令行参数 -V （或 --verbose ）启用详细模式以打印所有测试的输出。该 --output-on-failure 选项打印仅测试失败测试输出。可以将环境变量 CTEST_OUTPUT_ON_FAILURE 设置为 1 ,作为将 --output-on-failure 选项传递给 ctest(1) 的替代方法。
默认情况下， AUTOGEN_PARALLEL 是从 CMAKE_AUTOGEN_PARALLEL 初始化的。

trans-unit.source: By default GLOB lists directories - directories are omitted in result if LIST_DIRECTORIES is set to false.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， GLOB 列出目录-如果 LIST_DIRECTORIES 设置为false，则目录将被省略。

trans-unit.source: By default GLOB_RECURSE omits directories from result list - setting LIST_DIRECTORIES to true adds directories to result list. If FOLLOW_SYMLINKS is given or policy CMP0009 is not set to NEW then LIST_DIRECTORIES treats symlinks as directories.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， GLOB_RECURSE 从结果列表中省略目录-将 LIST_DIRECTORIES 设置为true会将目录添加到结果列表。如果给出了 FOLLOW_SYMLINKS 或策略 CMP0009 未设置为 NEW ,则 LIST_DIRECTORIES 会将符号链接视为目录。

trans-unit.source: By default GLOB_RECURSE omits directories from result list - setting LIST_DIRECTORIES to true adds directories to result list. If FOLLOW_SYMLINKS is given or policy CMP0009 is not set to OLD then LIST_DIRECTORIES treats symlinks as directories.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， GLOB_RECURSE 从结果列表中删除目录-将 LIST_DIRECTORIES 设置为true会将目录添加到结果列表。如果给出 FOLLOW_SYMLINKS 或策略 CMP0009 未设置为 OLD ,则 LIST_DIRECTORIES 会将符号链接视为目录。

trans-unit.source: By default configure_package_config_file also generates two helper macros, set_and_check() and check_required_components() into the FooConfig.cmake file.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， configure_package_config_file 还会在 FooConfig.cmake 文件中生成两个帮助程序宏 set_and_check() 和 check_required_components() 。

trans-unit.source: By default CTest uses configuration options from configuration file. This option will overwrite the configuration option.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,CTest使用配置文件中的配置选项。这个选项将覆盖配置选项。

trans-unit.source: By default CTest will run child CTest instances within the same process. If this behavior is not desired, this argument will enforce new processes for child CTest processes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,CTest 将在同一进程中运行子 CTest 实例。如果不需要这种行为,这个参数将为子 CTest 进程执行新的进程。
默认情况下,它是开启的。

trans-unit.source: By default linking to a shared library target transitively links to targets with which the library itself was linked. For an executable with exports (see the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property) no default transitive link dependencies are used. This property replaces the default transitive link dependencies with an explicit list. When the target is linked into another target using the target_link_libraries() command, the libraries listed (and recursively their link interface libraries) will be provided to the other target also. If the list is empty then no transitive link dependencies will be incorporated when this target is linked into another target even if the default set is non-empty. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES variable if it is set when a target is created. This property is ignored for STATIC libraries.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，链接到共享库目标会过渡性链接到链接库本身的目标。对于具有导出功能的可执行文件（请参见 ENABLE_EXPORTS 目标属性），不使用默认的传递链接依赖项。此属性用显式列表替换默认的传递链接依赖关系。当使用 target_link_libraries() 命令将目标链接到另一个目标时，列出的库（以及递归其链接接口库）也将提供给另一个目标。如果列表为空，则即使此默认集合为非空，当此目标链接到另一个目标时，也不会合并传递链接依赖项。此属性由 CMAKE_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES 的值初始化如果在创建目标时设置了变量。 STATIC 库将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: By default on macOS, system framework is search first. In other words, OpenAL is searched in the following order:
trans-unit.target: macOS默认情况下,系统框架是先搜索的。换句话说,OpenAL的搜索顺序如下。

trans-unit.source: By default static library targets have this property is disabled, while shared, module, and executable targets have this property enabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,静态库目标的这个属性是禁用的,而共享、模块和可执行目标的这个属性是启用的。

trans-unit.source: By default the export(PACKAGE) command does nothing (see policy CMP0090) because populating the user package registry has effects outside the source and build trees. Set the CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable to add build directories to the CMake user package registry.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， export(PACKAGE) 命令不执行任何操作（请参阅策略 CMP0090 ），因为填充用户软件包注册表会在源代码和构建树之外产生影响。设置 CMAKE_EXPORT_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 变量以将构建目录添加到CMake用户软件包注册表。

trans-unit.source: By default the directories specified are appended onto the current list of directories. This default behavior can be changed by setting CMAKE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES_BEFORE to ON. By using AFTER or BEFORE explicitly, you can select between appending and prepending, independent of the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，指定的目录将追加到当前目录列表中。可以通过将 CMAKE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES_BEFORE 设置为 ON 来更改此默认行为。通过显式使用 AFTER 或 BEFORE ，可以独立于默认值在追加和前置之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: By default the directories specified are appended onto the current list of directories. This default behavior can be changed by setting CMAKE_LINK_DIRECTORIES_BEFORE to ON. By using AFTER or BEFORE explicitly, you can select between appending and prepending, independent of the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，指定的目录将追加到当前目录列表中。可以通过将 CMAKE_LINK_DIRECTORIES_BEFORE 设置为 ON 来更改此默认行为。通过显式使用 AFTER 或 BEFORE ，可以独立于默认值在追加和前置之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: By default the executable file will be created in the build tree directory corresponding to the source tree directory in which the command was invoked. See documentation of the RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY target property to change this location. See documentation of the OUTPUT_NAME target property to change the <name> part of the final file name.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将在与调用命令的源树目录相对应的构建树目录中创建可执行文件。请参阅 RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 目标属性的文档以更改此位置。请参阅 OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性的文档，以更改最终文件名的 <name> 部分。

trans-unit.source: By default the library file will be created in the build tree directory corresponding to the source tree directory in which the command was invoked. See documentation of the ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY, LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY, and RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY target properties to change this location. See documentation of the OUTPUT_NAME target property to change the <name> part of the final file name.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，库文件将在与调用命令的源树目录相对应的构建树目录中创建。请参阅的文件 ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ， LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 和 RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 目标属性来更改这个位置。请参阅 OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性的文档，以更改最终文件名的 <name> 部分。

trans-unit.source: By default the value stored in the result variable will be the path at which the file is found. The CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_RESOLVE_SYMLINKS variable may be set to TRUE before calling find_package in order to resolve symbolic links and store the real path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，存储在结果变量中的值将是找到文件的路径。可以在调用 find_package 之前将 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_RESOLVE_SYMLINKS 变量设置为 TRUE ，以便解析符号链接并存储文件的实际路径。

trans-unit.source: By default this contains a list of directories containing incompatible binaries for the host system. See the CMAKE_IGNORE_PATH variable that is intended to be set by the project.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它包含目录列表，该目录包含主机系统不兼容的二进制文件。请参阅打算由项目设置的 CMAKE_IGNORE_PATH 变量。

trans-unit.source: By default this contains the standard directories for the current system, the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX, and the CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX. The installation and staging prefixes may be excluded by setting the CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它包含当前系统的标准目录 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 和 CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX 。可以通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量来排除安装和登台前缀。

trans-unit.source: By default this contains the system directories for the current system, the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX, and the CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX. The installation and staging prefixes may be excluded by setting the CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它包含当前系统的系统目录 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 和 CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX 。可以通过设置 CMAKE_FIND_NO_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量来排除安装和登台前缀。

trans-unit.source: By default this is empty. It is intended to be set by the project.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下是空的。它是由项目设置的。

trans-unit.source: By default this is empty; it is intended to be set by the project. Note that CMAKE_IGNORE_PATH takes a list of directory names, not a list of prefixes. To ignore paths under prefixes (bin, include, lib, etc.), specify them explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下为空；它打算由项目设置。请注意， CMAKE_IGNORE_PATH 包含目录名称列表，而不是前缀列表。要忽略前缀（ bin ， include ， lib 等）下的路径，请明确指定它们。

trans-unit.source: By default this module will search for all of the FLTK components and add them to the FLTK_LIBRARIES variable. You can limit the components which get placed in FLTK_LIBRARIES by defining one or more of the following three options:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该模块将搜索所有FLTK组件，并将它们添加到 FLTK_LIBRARIES 变量中。您可以通过定义以下三个选项中的一个或多个来限制放置在 FLTK_LIBRARIES 中的组件：

trans-unit.source: By default this variable is not set and the behavior will fall back to that determined by the deprecated CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable. If that is also not set, then find_package() will use the User Package Registry unless the NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY option is provided.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此变量，并且行为将恢复为不赞成使用的 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 变量所确定的行为。如果尚未设置，则除非提供了 NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 选项，否则 find_package() 将使用用户软件包注册表。

trans-unit.source: By default this variable is not set and the behavior will fall back to that determined by the deprecated CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY variable. If that is also not set, then find_package() will use the System Package Registry unless the NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY option is provided.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此变量，并且行为将退回到由不 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 使用的CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY变量确定的行为。如果未设置，则除非提供了 NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 选项，否则 find_package() 将使用系统软件包注册表。

trans-unit.source: By default this variable is not set, which is equivalent to it having a value of TRUE. Explicit options given to the above commands take precedence over this variable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此变量，等效于其值为 TRUE 。上面命令给出的显式选项优先于此变量。

trans-unit.source: By default this variable is not set. If neither CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY nor CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is set, then find_package() will use the User Package Registry unless the NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY option is provided.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此变量。如果既未设置 CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY ,也 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 设置CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_PACKAGE_REGISTRY，则除非提供了 NO_CMAKE_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 选项，否则 find_package() 将使用用户程序包注册表。

trans-unit.source: By default this variable is not set. If neither CMAKE_FIND_USE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY nor CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY is set, then find_package() will use the System Package Registry unless the NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY option is provided.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置此变量。如果既未设置 CMAKE_FIND_USE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY ,也 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 设置CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_NO_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY，则除非提供了 NO_CMAKE_SYSTEM_PACKAGE_REGISTRY 选项，否则 find_package() 将使用系统程序包注册表。

trans-unit.source: By default, AUTOMOC behaves exactly as described in the documentation of the AUTOMOC target property. When set to TRUE, it accepts more input and tries to find the correct input file for moc even if it differs from the documented behaviour. In this mode it e.g. also checks whether a header file is intended to be processed by moc when a "foo.moc" file has been included.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， AUTOMOC 的行为与 AUTOMOC target属性的文档中所述完全相同。设置为 TRUE 时，它将接受更多输入，并尝试为 moc 找到正确的输入文件，即使它与已记录的行为不同。在这种模式下，例如，当包含 "foo.moc" 文件时，它还会检查是否打算由moc处理头文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, BU_COPY_FULL_FRAMEWORK_CONTENTS is not set. If you want full frameworks embedded in your bundles, set BU_COPY_FULL_FRAMEWORK_CONTENTS to ON before calling fixup_bundle. By default, COPY_RESOLVED_FRAMEWORK_INTO_BUNDLE copies the framework dylib itself plus the framework Resources directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，未设置 BU_COPY_FULL_FRAMEWORK_CONTENTS 。如果你想镶嵌在你的包全框架，设置 BU_COPY_FULL_FRAMEWORK_CONTENTS 到 ON 调用fixup_bundle之前。默认情况下， COPY_RESOLVED_FRAMEWORK_INTO_BUNDLE 复制框架dylib本身以及框架 Resources 目录。

trans-unit.source: By default, CMake’s model is that a build directory only contains a single configuration, be it Debug, Release, MinSizeRel, or RelWithDebInfo. It is possible, however, to setup CPack to bundle multiple build directories and construct a package that contains multiple configurations of the same project.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，CMake的模型是构建目录仅包含单个配置，可以是Debug，Release，MinSizeRel或RelWithDebInfo。但是，可以将CPack设置为捆绑多个构建目录，并构建一个包含同一项目的多个配置的软件包。

trans-unit.source: By default, CMake's model is that a build directory only contains a single configuration, be it Debug, Release, MinSizeRel, or RelWithDebInfo. It is possible, however, to setup CPack to bundle multiple build directories and construct a package that contains multiple configurations of the same project.

By default, all content is written directly to the <file>. The OUTPUT_FILES_VAR may be specified to cause the compiler-specific content to be written to separate files. The separate files are then available in the <output_files_var> and may be consumed by the caller for installation for example. The OUTPUT_DIR specifies a relative path from the main <file> to the compiler-specific files. For example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有内容都直接写入 <file> 。该 OUTPUT_FILES_VAR 可以被指定为使编译器特有的内容写入到单独的文件。然后，单独的文件在 <output_files_var> 中可用，并且可以由调用方使用，例如进行安装。所述 OUTPUT_DIR 指定从主相对路径 <file> 到编译器特定的文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: By default, every symbols inside a MEX file defined with the command matlab_add_mex() have hidden visibility, except for the entry point. This is the default behaviour of the MEX compiler, which lowers the risk of symbol collision between the libraries shipped with Matlab, and the libraries to which the MEX file is linking to. This is also the default on Windows platforms.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，用 matlab_add_mex() 命令定义的MEX文件中的每个符号都具有隐藏的可见性，入口点除外。这是MEX编译器的默认行为，它降低了Matlab随附的库与MEX文件链接到的库之间发生符号冲突的风险。这也是Windows平台上的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: By default, if CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED_VERSION is 3.1 or later, or if PKG_CONFIG_USE_CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH is set to a boolean True value, then the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH, CMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH, and CMAKE_APPBUNDLE_PATH cache and environment variables will be added to the pkg-config search path. The NO_CMAKE_PATH and NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH arguments disable this behavior for the cache variables and environment variables respectively.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果 CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED_VERSION 为3.1或更高版本，或者如果 PKG_CONFIG_USE_CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 设置为布尔 True 值，则 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH ， CMAKE_FRAMEWORK_PATH 和 CMAKE_APPBUNDLE_PATH 缓存和环境变量将添加到 pkg-config 。该 NO_CMAKE_PATH 和 NO_CMAKE_ENVIRONMENT_PATH 参数禁用此行为分别缓存变量和环境变量。

trans-unit.source: By default, invoking ctest(1) without a script will read custom files from the binary directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不带脚本调用 ctest(1) 将从二进制目录读取自定义文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, source file properties are only visible to targets added in the same directory (CMakeLists.txt). Visibility can be set in other directory scopes using one or both of the following options:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，源文件属性仅对添加到同一目录（ CMakeLists.txt ）中的目标可见。可以使用以下一个或两个选项在其他目录范围内设置可见性：

trans-unit.source: By default, the IMPORTED target name has scope in the directory in which it is created and below. We can use the GLOBAL option to extended visibility so that the target is accessible globally in the build system.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， IMPORTED 目标名称在创建它的目录中和下面具有作用域。我们可以使用 GLOBAL 选项来扩展可见性，以便可以在构建系统中全局访问目标。

trans-unit.source: By default, the add_library() command defines a STATIC library, unless a type is specified. A type may be specified when using the command:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，除非指定了类型，否则 add_library() 命令定义 STATIC 库。使用命令时可以指定类型：

trans-unit.source: By default, the install target depends on the all target. This has the effect, that when make install is invoked or INSTALL is built, first the all target is built, then the installation starts. If CMAKE_SKIP_INSTALL_ALL_DEPENDENCY is set to TRUE, this dependency is not created, so the installation process will start immediately, independent from whether the project has been completely built or not.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， install 目标取决于 all 目标。这样的效果是，当调用 make install 或构建 INSTALL 时，首先构建 all 目标，然后开始安装。如果 CMAKE_SKIP_INSTALL_ALL_DEPENDENCY 设置为 TRUE ，则不会创建此依赖项，因此安装过程将立即开始，而与项目是否已完全构建无关。

trans-unit.source: By default, the source file’s property will be read from the current source directory’s scope, but this can be overridden with one of the following sub-options:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将从当前源目录的范围中读取源文件的属性，但是可以使用以下子选项之一来覆盖它：

trans-unit.source: By default, the source file's property will be read from the current source directory's scope.
By default, the test source file will be given a .F90 file extension. The SRC_EXT option can be used to override this with .<extension> instead.

trans-unit.source: By default, the test source file will be given a .F file extension. The SRC_EXT option can be used to override this with .<extension> instead– .F90 is a typical choice.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，测试源文件将具有 .F 文件扩展名。该 SRC_EXT 选项可用于与覆盖此 .<extension> instead- .F90 是一个典型的选择。

trans-unit.source: By default, the test source file will be given a .F file extension. The SRC_EXT option can be used to override this with .<extension> instead-- .F90 is a typical choice.
By default, the test source file will be given a file extension that matches the requested language. The SRC_EXT option can be used to override this with .<extension> instead.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将为测试源文件提供与请求的语言匹配的文件扩展名。该 SRC_EXT 选项可用于与覆盖此 .<extension> 代替。

trans-unit.source: By default, the type index of type-parameterized tests is replaced by the actual type name in the CTest test name. If this behavior is undesirable (e.g. because the type names are unwieldy), this option will suppress this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,类型参数化测试的类型索引会被CTest测试名称中的实际类型名称所取代。如果这种行为是不可取的(例如,因为类型名很累赘),这个选项将抑制这种行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value index of value-parameterized tests is replaced by the actual value in the CTest test name. If this behavior is undesirable (e.g. because the value strings are unwieldy), this option will suppress this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,值参数化测试的值索引会被CTest测试名称中的实际值取代。如果这种行为不可取(例如,因为值字符串很累赘),这个选项将抑制这种行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, this module supports multiple calls in different directories of a project with different version/component requirements while providing correct and consistent results for each call. To support this behavior, CMake cache is not used in the traditional way which can be problematic for interactive specification. So, to enable also interactive specification, module behavior can be controlled with the following variable:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该模块支持具有不同版本/组件要求的项目不同目录中的多个调用，同时为每个调用提供正确且一致的结果。为了支持此行为，不以传统方式使用 CMake 缓存，这对于交互式规范可能会出现问题。因此，为了也启用交互式规范，可以使用以下变量来控制模块行为：

trans-unit.source: By putting all the options that affect the build into a file and then make the build rule dependent on the file, the output files will be regenerated when the options change.
By setting NATURAL order we can select the one with the highest version number libX-1.2.10.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 NATURAL order，我们可以选择版本号最高的 libX-1.2.10 。

trans-unit.source: By setting the CMAKE_DISABLE_FIND_PACKAGE_<PackageName> variable to TRUE, the <PackageName> package will not be searched, and will always be NOTFOUND.

trans-unit.source: By setting this property to ON, you can disable compilation of the given source file, even if it should be compiled because it is part of the library’s/executable’s sources.

trans-unit.source: By using AFTER or BEFORE explicitly, you can select between appending and prepending, independent of the default.

Byproducts may not be listed as outputs because their timestamps are allowed to be older than the inputs. No build tools (like make) that existed when CMake was designed have a way to express byproducts. Therefore CMake versions prior to 3.2 had no way to specify them. Projects typically left byproducts undeclared in the rules that generate them. For example:

trans-unit.source: CMAKE_EXPAND_IMPORTED_TARGETS() takes a list of libraries and replaces all imported targets contained in this list with their actual file paths of the referenced libraries on disk, including the libraries from their link interfaces. If a CONFIGURATION is given, it uses the respective configuration of the imported targets if it exists. If no CONFIGURATION is given, it uses the first configuration from ${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES} if set, otherwise ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}.
trans-unit.target: CMAKE_EXPAND_IMPORTED_TARGETS()获取一个库的列表,并将这个列表中包含的所有导入的目标替换为它们在磁盘上被引用的库的实际文件路径,包括它们的链接接口的库。如果给定了 CONFIGURATION,如果存在,则使用导入目标的相应配置。如果没有给定 CONFIGURATION,则使用 ${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES}中的第一个配置(如果设置了),否则使用 ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}。

trans-unit.source: CMP0113: Makefile generators do not repeat custom commands from target dependencies.
trans-unit.target: CMP0113.Makefile生成器不重复目标依赖的自定义命令。Makefile生成器不重复目标依赖的自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: CMP0114: ExternalProject step targets fully adopt their steps.
trans-unit.target: CMP0114:外部项目步骤目标完全采用其步骤。

trans-unit.source: CMP0115: Source file extensions must be explicit.
CMP0116: Ninja generators transform DEPFILEs from add_custom_command().
CMP0117: MSVC RTTI flag /GR is not added to CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS by default.
CMP0118: The GENERATED source file property is now visible in all directories.
CMP0119: LANGUAGE source file property explicitly compiles as language.
CMP0120: The WriteCompilerDetectionHeader module is removed.

CMake >= 3.0 prefer that this command never be called. The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow the command to be called. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue a FATAL_ERROR when the command is called.
trans-unit.target: CMake> = 3.0表示永远不要调用此命令。此策略的 OLD 行为是允许调用该命令。此策略的 NEW 行为是在调用命令时发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.4 and below implemented linking to libraries whose full paths are known by splitting them on the link line into separate components consisting of the linker search path and the library name. The example code might have produced something like
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.4及以下版本实现了对已知完整路径的库的链接,通过在链接行中将它们分割成由链接器搜索路径和库名组成的独立组件。这个例子的代码可能会产生这样的结果

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.6.3 and below silently permitted add_subdirectory() calls to create the same binary directory multiple times. During build system generation files would be written and then overwritten in the build tree and could lead to strange behavior. CMake 2.6.4 and above explicitly detect duplicate binary directories. CMake 2.6.4 always considers this case an error. In CMake 2.8.0 and above this policy determines whether or not the case is an error. The OLD behavior for this policy is to allow duplicate binary directories. The NEW behavior for this policy is to disallow duplicate binary directories with an error.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.6.3及更低版本静默允许add_subdirectory（）调用多次创建同一二进制目录。在构建系统生成期间，文件将被写入，然后在构建树中被覆盖，并可能导致奇怪的行为。 CMake 2.6.4及更高版本明确检测重复的二进制目录。 CMake 2.6.4始终将这种情况视为错误。在CMake 2.8.0及更高版本中，此策略确定大小写是否为错误。此策略的 OLD 行为是允许重复的二进制目录。此策略的新行为是禁止重复的二进制目录出现错误。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.10 and lower re-evaluated values given to the include_directories, link_directories, and link_libraries commands to expand any leftover variable references at the end of the configuration step. This was for strict compatibility with VERY early CMake versions because all variable references are now normally evaluated during CMake language processing. CMake 2.8.11 and higher prefer to skip the extra evaluation.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.10 及更低版本重新评估了 include_directories、link_directories 和 link_libraries 命令的值,以便在配置步骤结束时扩展任何剩余的变量引用。这是为了与早期的 CMake 版本严格兼容,因为现在所有的变量引用通常都是在 CMake 语言处理过程中评估的。CMake 2.8.11 及更高版本则倾向于跳过这些额外的评估。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.10 and lower required users of Qt to always specify a link dependency to the qtmain.lib static library manually on Windows. CMake 2.8.11 gained the ability to evaluate generator expressions while determining the link dependencies from IMPORTED targets. This allows CMake itself to automatically link executables which link to Qt to the qtmain.lib library when using IMPORTED Qt targets. For applications already linking to qtmain.lib, this should have little impact. For applications which supply their own alternative WinMain implementation and for applications which use the QAxServer library, this automatic linking will need to be disabled as per the documentation.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.10和更低版本的Qt用户必须始终在Windows上手动指定到 qtmain.lib 静态库的链接依赖项。 CMake 2.8.11获得了评估生成器表达式的能力，同时确定了来自 IMPORTED 目标的链接依赖性。这使得CMake的本身，其链接的Qt的自动链接可执行文件 qtmain.lib 使用时库 IMPORTED Qt的目标。对于已经链接到 qtmain.lib 的应用程序，这应该没有什么影响。对于提供自己的替代WinMain实现的应用程序以及使用QAxServer库的应用程序，将需要根据文档禁用此自动链接。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.10.2 and lower allowed the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property to contain relative paths. The base path for such relative entries is not well defined. CMake 2.8.12 issues a FATAL_ERROR if the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES property contains a relative path.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.10.2及更低版本允许 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性包含相对路径。此类相对条目的基本路径定义不明确。如果 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 属性包含相对路径，则CMake 2.8.12发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.11 constructed the ‘link interface’ of a target from properties matching (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)?. The modern way to specify config-sensitive content is to use generator expressions and the IMPORTED_ prefix makes uniform processing of the link interface with generator expressions impossible. The INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property was introduced as a replacement in CMake 2.8.12. This new property is named consistently with the INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS, INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES and INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS properties. For in-build targets, CMake will use the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property as the source of the link interface only if policy CMP0022 is NEW. When exporting a target which has this policy set to NEW, only the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property will be processed and generated for the IMPORTED target by default. A new option to the install(EXPORT) and export commands allows export of the old-style properties for compatibility with downstream users of CMake versions older than 2.8.12. The target_link_libraries() command will no longer populate the properties matching LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? if this policy is NEW.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.11通过属性匹配 (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? 构造了目标的“链接接口” ？LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES（_ <CONFIG>）？。指定配置敏感内容的现代方法是使用生成器表达式，而 IMPORTED_ 前缀使无法统一处理带有生成器表达式的链接接口。该 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target属性被引入作为CMake的2.8.12的替代品。此新属性的名称与 INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS ， INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 和 INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS 一致属性。对于内置目标，仅当策略 CMP0022 为 NEW 时，CMake才将INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES属性用作链接接口的源。导出将此策略设置为 NEW 的目标时，默认情况下，只会为 IMPORTED 目标处理和生成 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 属性。 install(EXPORT) 和export命令的新选项允许导出旧样式的属性，以便与2.8.12之前的CMake版本的下游用户兼容。所述 target_link_libraries() 命令将不再填充属性匹配 LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? 如果这项政策是 NEW 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.11 constructed the 'link interface' of a target from properties matching (IMPORTED_)?LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)?. The modern way to specify config-sensitive content is to use generator expressions and the IMPORTED_ prefix makes uniform processing of the link interface with generator expressions impossible. The INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property was introduced as a replacement in CMake 2.8.12. This new property is named consistently with the INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS, INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES and INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS properties. For in-build targets, CMake will use the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property as the source of the link interface only if policy CMP0022 is NEW. When exporting a target which has this policy set to NEW, only the INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES property will be processed and generated for the IMPORTED target by default. A new option to the install(EXPORT) and export commands allows export of the old-style properties for compatibility with downstream users of CMake versions older than 2.8.12. The target_link_libraries() command will no longer populate the properties matching LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES(_<CONFIG>)? if this policy is NEW.

CMake 2.8.11 introduced introduced the concept of INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, and a check at cmake time that the entries in the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of an IMPORTED target actually exist. CMake 2.8.11 also introduced generator expression support in the target_link_libraries() command. However, if an imported target is linked as a result of a generator expression evaluation, the entries in the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of that target were not checked for existence as they should be.
trans-unit.target: CMake的2.8.11介绍，介绍的概念 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ，并在cmake的时间进行检查，在条目 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 一个的 IMPORTED 目标确实存在。CMake 2.8.11还在 target_link_libraries() 命令中引入了生成器表达式支持。但是，如果由于生成器表达式求值而链接了一个导入的目标，则不会检查该目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中的条目是否应该存在。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed a build target to link to itself directly with a target_link_libraries() call. This is an indicator of a bug in user code.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12及更低版本允许构建目标通过 target_link_libraries() 调用直接链接至自身。这表明用户代码中存在错误。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed a signature for add_custom_command() which specified an input to a command. This was undocumented behavior. Modern use of CMake associates custom commands with their output, rather than their input.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12及更低版本允许 add_custom_command() 的签名指定命令的输入。这是未记录的行为。CMake的现代用法将自定义命令与其输出而不是其输入相关联。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed creating targets using add_library(), add_executable() and add_custom_target() with unrestricted choice for the target name. Newer cmake features such as cmake-generator-expressions(7) and some diagnostics expect target names to match a restricted pattern.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12及更低版本允许使用 add_library() ， add_executable() 和 add_custom_target() 创建目标，并且可以不受限制地选择目标名称。 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 等新的cmake功能以及某些诊断程序希望目标名称与受限模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed reading the LOCATION target property (and configuration-specific variants) to determine the eventual location of build targets. This relies on the assumption that all necessary information is available at configure-time to determine the final location and filename of the target. However, this property is not fully determined until later at generate-time. At generate time, the $<TARGET_FILE> generator expression can be used to determine the eventual LOCATION of a target output.

CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed reading the LOCATION target property (and configuration-specific variants) to determine the eventual location of build targets. This relies on the assumption that all necessary information is available at configure-time to determine the final location and filename of the target. However, this property is not fully determined until later at generate-time. At generate time, the $<TARGET_FILE> generator expression can be used to determine the eventual LOCATION of a target output.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12和更低版本允许读取 LOCATION 目标属性（以及特定于配置的变体）以确定构建目标的最终位置。这基于这样的假设，即在配置时所有必需的信息都可用以确定目标的最终位置和文件名。但是，直到稍后在生成时才完全确定此属性。在生成时， $<TARGET_FILE> 生成器表达式可用于确定目标输出的最终 LOCATION 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed setting the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> target property and COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> directory property to apply configuration-specific compile definitions.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12和更低版本允许设置 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> 目标属性和 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> 目录属性以应用特定于配置的编译定义。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed the use of targets and files with double colons in target_link_libraries(), with some buildsystem generators.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12及更低版本允许在 target_link_libraries() 中使用带有某些构建系统生成器的带有双冒号的目标和文件。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed use of the include() command with the result of the export() command. This relies on the assumption that the export() command has an immediate effect at configure-time during a cmake run. Certain properties of targets are not fully determined until later at generate-time, such as the link language and complete list of link libraries. Future refactoring will change the effect of the export() command to be executed at generate-time. Use ALIAS targets instead in cases where the goal is to refer to targets by another name.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12及更低版本允许在 export() 命令的结果中使用 include() （）命令。这基于以下假设：在cmake运行期间， export() 命令在配置时立即生效。目标的某些属性直到生成时才完全确定，例如链接语言和链接库的完整列表。将来的重构将改变在生成时执行的 export() 命令的效果。如果目标是通过其他名称引用目标，请改用 ALIAS 目标。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower allowed using utility targets in the left hand side position of the target_link_libraries() command. This is an indicator of a bug in user code.
trans-unit.target: 在 target_link_libraries() 命令的左侧位置使用实用程序目标可以允许CMake 2.8.12及更低版本。这表明用户代码中存在错误。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower performed an extra layer of variable expansion when evaluating source file names:
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12 和更低版本在评估源文件名时执行了额外的一层变量扩展。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower silently ignored a custom command created with the TARGET signature of add_custom_command() if the target is unknown or was defined outside the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标未知或在当前目录之外定义，则CMake 2.8.12及更低版本会静默忽略使用 TARGET 签名的 add_custom_command() 创建的自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and lower silently ignored non-existent dependencies listed in the add_dependencies() command.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12和更低版本默默地忽略了 add_dependencies() 命令中列出的不存在的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and newer has support for using @rpath in a target’s install name. This was enabled by setting the target property MACOSX_RPATH. The @rpath in an install name is a more flexible and powerful mechanism than @executable_path or @loader_path for locating shared libraries.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12和更高版本支持在目标的安装名称中使用 @rpath 。这是通过设置目标属性 MACOSX_RPATH 启用的。与 @executable_path 或 @loader_path 相比，安装名称中的 @rpath 是一种更加灵活和强大的机制，用于查找共享库。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 and newer has support for using @rpath in a target's install name. This was enabled by setting the target property MACOSX_RPATH. The @rpath in an install name is a more flexible and powerful mechanism than @executable_path or @loader_path for locating shared libraries.

CMake 2.8.12 introduced the target_link_libraries() signature using the PUBLIC, PRIVATE, and INTERFACE keywords to generalize the LINK_PUBLIC and LINK_PRIVATE keywords introduced in CMake 2.8.7. Use of signatures with any of these keywords sets the link interface of a target explicitly, even if empty. This produces confusing behavior when used in combination with the historical behavior of the plain target_link_libraries() signature. For example, consider the code:
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12 通过使用 PUBLIC ， PRIVATE 和 INTERFACE 关键字引入了 target_link_libraries() 签名，以概括CMake 2.8.7中引入的 LINK_PUBLIC 和 LINK_PRIVATE 关键字。将签名与这些关键字中的任何一个一起使用时，即使为空，也可以显式设置目标的链接接口。与简单的 target_link_libraries() 签名的历史行为结合使用时，这会产生令人困惑的行为。例如，考虑以下代码：

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.12 introduced the <LANG>_COMPILER_IDgenerator expressions to allow comparison of the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID with a test value. The possible valid values are lowercase, but the comparison with the test value was performed case-insensitively.
trans-unit.target: CMake 2.8.12引入了 <LANG>_COMPILER_ID generator expressions 以允许将 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 与测试值进行比较。可能的有效值是小写字母，但与测试值的比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: CMake 2.8.8 and lower compiled sources in SHARED and MODULE libraries using the value of the undocumented CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS platform variable. The variable contained platform-specific flags needed to compile objects for shared libraries. Typically it included a flag such as -fPIC for position independent code but also included other flags needed on certain platforms. CMake 2.8.9 and higher prefer instead to use the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE target property to determine what targets should be position independent, and new undocumented platform variables to select flags while ignoring CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS completely.
trans-unit.target: 使用未记录的 CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS 平台变量的值， SHARED 和 MODULE 库中的CMake 2.8.8及更低版本的已编译源代码。该变量包含编译共享库对象所需的特定于平台的标志。通常，它包含诸如 -fPIC 的标志，用于位置独立代码，但也包含某些平台上所需的其他标志。 CMake 2.8.9及更高版本更喜欢使用 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 目标属性来确定哪些目标应独立于位置，并使用新的未记录的平台变量来选择标志，而完全忽略 CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.0 and above recognize that Apple Clang is a different compiler than upstream Clang and that they have different version numbers. CMake now prefers to present this to projects by setting the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable to AppleClang instead of Clang. However, existing projects may assume the compiler id for Apple Clang is just Clang as it was in CMake versions prior to 3.0. Therefore this policy determines for Apple Clang which compiler id to report in the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable after language <LANG> is enabled by the project() or enable_language() command. The policy must be set prior to the invocation of either command.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.0及更高版本认识到Apple Clang是与上游Clang不同的编译器，并且它们具有不同的版本号。CMake现在更喜欢通过将 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量设置为 AppleClang 而不是 Clang 来将其呈现给项目。但是，现有项目可能假定Apple Clang的编译器ID只是 Clang ,就像在3.0之前的CMake版本中一样。因此，此策略为Apple Clang确定在 project() 或 enable_language() 启用语言 <LANG> 后，要在 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量中报告哪个编译器ID。命令。必须在调用任一命令之前设置该策略。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.0 and above recognize that the QNX qcc compiler driver is different from the GNU compiler. CMake now prefers to present this to projects by setting the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable to QCC instead of GNU. However, existing projects may assume the compiler id for QNX qcc is just GNU as it was in CMake versions prior to 3.0. Therefore this policy determines for QNX qcc which compiler id to report in the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable after language <LANG> is enabled by the project() or enable_language() command. The policy must be set prior to the invocation of either command.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.0及更高版本认识到QNX qcc编译器驱动程序与GNU编译器不同。 CMake现在更喜欢通过将 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量设置为 QCC 而不是 GNU 来将其呈现给项目。但是，现有项目可能假设QNX qcc的编译器ID只是 GNU ,就像在3.0之前的CMake版本中一样。因此，此策略为QNX qcc确定在通过 project() 或 enable_language() 命令启用语言 <LANG> 后，要在 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量中报告哪个编译器ID 。必须在调用任一命令之前设置该策略。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.0 and later prefer this property to be ON by default. Projects wanting @rpath in a target’s install name may remove any setting of the INSTALL_NAME_DIR and CMAKE_INSTALL_NAME_DIR variables.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.0及更高版本希望将此属性默认设置为ON。在目标安装名称中需要 @rpath 的项目可能会删除 INSTALL_NAME_DIR 和 CMAKE_INSTALL_NAME_DIR 变量的任何设置。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.0 and later prefer this property to be ON by default. Projects wanting @rpath in a target's install name may remove any setting of the INSTALL_NAME_DIR and CMAKE_INSTALL_NAME_DIR variables.

CMake 3.0 and lower allowed subdirectories of the source directory or build directory to be in the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of installed and exported targets, if the directory was also a subdirectory of the installation prefix. This makes the installation depend on the existence of the source dir or binary dir, and the installation will be broken if either are removed after installation.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.0和更低版本允许源目录或构建目录的子目录位于已安装和导出的目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中（如果该目录也是安装前缀的子目录）。这使得安装依赖于源目录或二进制目录的存在，如果在安装后删除了两者，则安装将被破坏。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.0 and lower did not include the TARGET_OBJECTSgenerator expression when returning the SOURCES target property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 SOURCES 目标属性时，CMake 3.0及更低版本不包含 TARGET_OBJECTS generator expression 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.1 and above no longer implicitly dereference variables or interpret keywords in an if() command argument when it is a Quoted Argument or a Bracket Argument.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.1及更高版本不再是 if() 命令参数中带引号的参数或方括号参数的隐式取消引用变量或解释关键字。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.1 and below reported an error if <length> pointed past the end of <string>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <length> 指向 <string> 的末尾，则CMake 3.1及以下版本报告错误。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.1 and below reported an error if length pointed past the end of string.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.1及以下版本报告了一个错误,如果长度指向字符串的末端。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.1 and lower allowed calls to the break() command outside of a loop context and also ignored any given arguments. This was undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.1和更低版本允许在循环上下文之外调用 break() 命令，并且也忽略任何给定的参数。这是未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.1 introduced a much faster implementation of evaluation of the Variable References and Escape Sequences documented in the cmake-language(7) manual. While the behavior is identical to the legacy implementation in most cases, some corner cases were cleaned up to simplify the behavior. Specifically:
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.1引入了对 cmake-language(7) 手册中记录的变量引用和转义序列进行评估的更快的实现。尽管该行为在大多数情况下与旧版实现相同，但已清理了一些特殊情况以简化行为。特别：

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.10 and newer define that relative paths given to INPUT and OUTPUT arguments of file(GENERATE) are interpreted relative to the current source and binary directories, respectively. CMake 3.9 and lower did not define any behavior for relative paths but did not diagnose them either and accidentally treated them relative to the process working directory. Policy CMP0070 provides compatibility with projects that used the old undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.10及更高版本定义了分别相对于当前源目录和二进制目录解释给 file(GENERATE) 的 INPUT 和 OUTPUT 参数的相对路径。 CMake 3.9及更低版本没有为相对路径定义任何行为，但也没有诊断它们，并且相对于流程工作目录意外地对待了它们。策略 CMP0070 提供与使用旧的未定义行为的项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.11 and above prefer to choose GLVND libraries. This policy provides compatibility with projects that expect the legacy GL library to be used.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.11及以上版本更倾向于选择GLVND库。这个政策提供了与那些期望使用传统GL库的项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.12 and above now prefer to not produce these cache entries at all. This policy provides compatibility with projects that have not been updated to avoid using them.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.12及以上版本现在倾向于完全不产生这些缓存条目。这个政策为那些没有更新的项目提供了兼容性,以避免使用它们。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.12 and lower allowed the LINK_DIRECTORIES directory property to contain relative paths. The base path for such relative entries is not well defined. CMake 3.13 and later will issue a FATAL_ERROR if the LINK_DIRECTORIES target property (which is initialized by the LINK_DIRECTORIES directory property) contains a relative path.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.12及更低版本允许 LINK_DIRECTORIES 目录属性包含相对路径。此类相对条目的基本路径定义不明确。如果 LINK_DIRECTORIES 目标属性（由 LINK_DIRECTORIES 目录属性初始化）包含相对路径，则CMake 3.13和更高版本将发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.13 and lower did not add these link flags when POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 时，CMake 3.13及更低版本未添加这些链接标志。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.13 and lower ran the install rules from add_subdirectory() after all other install rules, even if add_subdirectory() was called before the other install rules. CMake 3.14 and above prefer to interleave these add_subdirectory() install rules with the others so that they are run in the order they are declared. This policy provides compatibility for projects that have not been updated to expect the new behavior.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.13和更低版本会在所有其他安装规则之后从 add_subdirectory() 运行安装规则，即使在其他安装规则之前调用了 add_subdirectory() 。 CMake 3.14及更高版本更喜欢将这些 add_subdirectory() 安装规则与其他规则交叉使用，以便它们按照声明的顺序运行。此策略为尚未更新的项目提供兼容性，以防止出现新的行为。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.13 now allows the target_link_libraries() command to be called from any directory to add link dependencies and link interface libraries to targets created in other directories. The entries are added to LINK_LIBRARIES and INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES using a special (internal) suffix to tell the generators to look up the names in the calling scope rather than the scope that created the target.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.13现在允许从任何目录调用 target_link_libraries() 命令，以将链接依赖性和链接接口库添加到在其他目录中创建的目标。使用特殊的（内部）后缀将条目添加到 LINK_LIBRARIES 和 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 中,以告诉生成器在调用范围而不是创建目标的范围中查找名称。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.15 and above prefer to leave out warning flags from the value of CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，CMake 3.15及更高版本希望从 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 的值中忽略警告标志。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.15 and above prefer to leave the MSVC runtime library selection flags out of the default CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> values and instead offer a first-class abstraction. The CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY variable and MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY target property may be set to select the MSVC runtime library. If they are not set then CMake uses the default value MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>DLL which is equivalent to the original flags.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.15及更高版本更喜欢将MSVC运行时库选择标志保留在默认 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 值之外，而提供一流的抽象。可以将 CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 变量和 MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 目标属性设置为选择MSVC运行时库。如果未设置它们，则CMake使用默认值 MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>DLL ，它等于原始标志。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.15 and above recognize that IBM’s Clang-based XL compilers that define __ibmxl__ are a new front-end distinct from xlc with a different command line and set of capabilities. CMake now prefers to present this to projects by setting the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable to XLClang instead of XL. However, existing projects may assume the compiler id for Clang-based XL is just XL as it was in CMake versions prior to 3.15. Therefore this policy determines for Clang-based XL compilers which compiler id to report in the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable after language <LANG> is enabled by the project() or enable_language() command. The policy must be set prior to the invocation of either command.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.15及更高版本认识到，定义 __ibmxl__ 的 IBM基于Clang的XL编译器是一个新的前端，不同于 xlc ，具有不同的命令行和功能集。 CMake现在更喜欢通过将 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量设置为 XLClang 而不是 XL 来将其呈现给项目。但是，现有项目可能假定基于Clang的XL的编译器ID只是 XL ,就像3.15之前的CMake版本一样。因此，此策略为基于Clang的XL编译器确定在 project() 启用语言 <LANG> 后，要在 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 变量中报告哪个编译器ID。或 enable_language() 命令。必须在调用任一命令之前设置该策略。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.15 and above recognize that IBM's Clang-based XL compilers that define __ibmxl__ are a new front-end distinct from xlc with a different command line and set of capabilities. CMake now prefers to present this to projects by setting the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable to XLClang instead of XL. However, existing projects may assume the compiler id for Clang-based XL is just XL as it was in CMake versions prior to 3.15. Therefore this policy determines for Clang-based XL compilers which compiler id to report in the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID variable after language <LANG> is enabled by the project() or enable_language() command. The policy must be set prior to the invocation of either command.

CMake 3.19 and above prefer to not duplicate custom commands in a target that are already generated in other targets on which the target depends (directly or indirectly). This policy provides compatibility for projects that have not been updated to expect the new behavior. In particular, projects that relied on the duplicate execution or that did not properly set the SYMBOLIC source file property may be affected.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.19及更高版本不希望在目标中复制自定义命令，该命令已在目标所依赖的其他目标中（直接或间接）生成。该策略为尚未更新的项目提供兼容性，以防止出现新的行为。特别是，依赖于重复执行或未正确设置 SYMBOLIC 源文件属性的项目可能会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.2 introduced the BYPRODUCTS option to the add_custom_command() and add_custom_target() commands. This option allows byproducts to be specified explicitly:
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.2将 BYPRODUCTS 选项引入了add_custom_command add_custom_command() 和 add_custom_target() 命令。此选项允许明确指定副产品：

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.20 and above prefer to leave out /GR from the value of CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS by default.
CMake 3.3 adds support for the new IN_LIST operator.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.3 增加了对新的 IN_LIST 操作符的支持。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.3 and above no longer make a list of definitions available through the DEFINITIONS directory property. The COMPILE_DEFINITIONS directory property may be used instead.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.3及更高版本不再通过 DEFINITIONS 目录属性提供定义列表。该 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 目录属性可以替代使用。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.3 and above prefer to require projects to specify custom command byproducts explicitly so that it can avoid using the phony rule workaround altogether. Policy CMP0058 was introduced to provide compatibility with existing projects that still need the workaround.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.3及更高版本更喜欢要求项目明确指定自定义命令副产品，以便它可以避免完全使用 phony 规则解决方法。引入了策略 CMP0058 ，以提供与仍需要解决方法的现有项目的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.3 and below, for historical reasons, always linked executables on some platforms with flags like -rdynamic to export symbols from the executables for use by any plugins they may load via dlopen. CMake 3.4 and above prefer to do this only for executables that are explicitly marked with the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property.
trans-unit.target: CMake的3.3和在某些平台上用旗帜之下，由于历史的原因，总是与可执行喜欢 -rdynamic 从可执行文件使用导出符号通过它们可以通过加载任何插件 dlopen 。CMake 3.4及更高版本仅对标有 ENABLE_EXPORTS 目标属性的可执行文件执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.3 no longer allows the use of the install(FILES) command with the result of the export() command.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.3不再允许在 export() 命令的结果中使用 install(FILES) ）命令。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.9 and newer prefer to add IPO flags whenever the INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION target property is enabled and produce an error if flags are not known to CMake for the current compiler. Since a given compiler may not support IPO flags in all environments in which it is used, it is now the project’s responsibility to use the CheckIPOSupported module to check for support before enabling the INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION target property. This approach allows a project to conditionally activate IPO when supported. It also allows an end user to set the CMAKE_INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION variable in an environment known to support IPO even if the project does not enable the property.
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.9和更高版本更喜欢在启用 INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION 目标属性时添加IPO标志，如果CMake不了解当前编译器的标志，则会产生错误。由于给定的编译器可能在使用它的所有环境中均不支持IPO标志，因此，在启用 INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION 目标属性之前，使用 CheckIPOSupported 模块检查支持是项目的责任。这种方法允许项目在受支持时有条件地激活IPO。它还允许最终用户在已知支持IPO的环境中设置 CMAKE_INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION 变量，即使该项目未启用该属性也是如此。

trans-unit.source: CMake 3.9 and newer prefer to add IPO flags whenever the INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION target property is enabled and produce an error if flags are not known to CMake for the current compiler. Since a given compiler may not support IPO flags in all environments in which it is used, it is now the project's responsibility to use the CheckIPOSupported module to check for support before enabling the INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION target property. This approach allows a project to conditionally activate IPO when supported. It also allows an end user to set the CMAKE_INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION variable in an environment known to support IPO even if the project does not enable the property.
CMake 3.9 and newer remove any effect the following settings may have on the install_name of a target on macOS:
trans-unit.target: CMake 3.9和更高版本消除了以下设置可能对macOS上目标的 install_name 产生的任何影响：

trans-unit.source: CMake find_* commands will look in the sysroot, and the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH entries by default in all cases, as well as looking in the host system root prefix. Although this can be controlled on a case-by-case basis, when cross-compiling, it can be useful to exclude looking in either the host or the target for particular artifacts. Generally, includes, libraries and packages should be found in the target system prefixes, whereas executables which must be run as part of the build should be found only on the host and not on the target. This is the purpose of the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_MODE_* variables.
trans-unit.target: CMake find_* 命令将在所有情况下默认在 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 和CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH条目中查找，并在主机系统根前缀中查找。尽管这可以根据具体情况进行控制，但是在交叉编译时，排除主机或目标中的特定工件可能是有用的。通常，包括，库和软件包应在目标系统前缀中找到，而必须作为构建一部分运行的可执行文件应仅在主机上找到，而不在目标上。这是 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_MODE_* 变量的目的。

trans-unit.source: CMake Deprecation Error or Warning if variable CMAKE_ERROR_DEPRECATED or CMAKE_WARN_DEPRECATED is enabled, respectively, else no message.
trans-unit.target: 如果分别启用了变量 CMAKE_ERROR_DEPRECATED 或 CMAKE_WARN_DEPRECATED ,则CMake弃用错误或警告，否则没有消息。

trans-unit.source: CMake Error, continue processing, but skip generation.
trans-unit.target: CMake错误,继续处理,但跳过生成。

trans-unit.source: CMake Error, stop processing and generation.

CMake Generators are platform-specific so each may be available only on certain platforms. The cmake(1) command-line tool --help output lists available generators on the current platform. Use its -G option to specify the generator for a new build tree. The cmake-gui(1) offers interactive selection of a generator when creating a new build tree.
trans-unit.target: CMake Generator是特定于平台的，因此每个只能在某些平台上使用。所述 cmake(1) 的命令行工具 --help 当前平台输出列出可用的发电机。使用其 -G 选项为新的构建树指定生成器。当创建新的构建树时， cmake-gui(1) 提供对生成器的交互式选择。

trans-unit.source: CMake Language code in either Directories or Scripts may use the include() command to load a <module>.cmake source file in the scope of the including context. See the cmake-modules(7) manual page for documentation of modules included with the CMake distribution. Project source trees may also provide their own modules and specify their location(s) in the CMAKE_MODULE_PATH variable.
trans-unit.target: 目录或脚本中的 CMake语言代码可以使用 include() 命令在包含上下文的范围内加载 <module>.cmake 源文件。有关CMake发行版随附模块的文档，请参见 cmake-modules(7) 手册页。项目源树也可以提供自己的模块，并在 CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 变量中指定其位置。

trans-unit.source: CMake Language source files in a project are organized into:
trans-unit.target: 一个项目中的CMake语言源文件被组织成。
